Custom colors Custom theme Add action Replace action Remove action Take photo Import photos Add album GRANT ACCESS Suppersafe needs access to your file storage This allows Suppersafe to access and encrypt your photos or videos. EXIT SIGN IN with your Supper Safe account email Email NEXT Confirm Please check your connections YES Check %1$s for an access code to log in Access code SIGN IN RESEND CODE SIGN UP HERE Welcome to Suppersafe A safe place for your photos or videos Add an email in the case you forget Name Finish This app demonstrates the usage of CameraView. In order to do that, it needs permission to access camera. Camera app cannot do anything without camera permission. Picture taken Aspect ratio Switch flash Switch camera Flash auto Flash off Flash on

mail.suppersafe@gmail.com Phong@123 tpcreative.co@gmail.com Verify/Change Account View/Change Account Cloud Enable Cloud Sync All your files will be sync to cloud. They will never lost. ENABLE NOW Upgrade To Pro Verify Your Email SEND VERIFICATION CODE OR LOGIN WITH GOOGLE CANCEL SAVE SignIn with Google Choose your Google account to sign in SupperSafe OK Enable cloud sync after sign in Local Photos Videos Others Account License Status Free Pro Link Google Drive to store your encrypted files Your Google Drive account is below. Link it to restore previous files LINK GOOGLE DRIVE USE ANOTHER GOOGLE DRIVE Cloud Manager Monthly Usage %1$s/%2$s Please select %1$s to link to Google Drive Please select or add your Google account to sign in with SupperSafe Not the same account Please select %1$s SELECT AGAIN USER ANOTHER Are you sure want to change another Google Drive? user items list_items email user_id password tpcreative.co name Welcome to SupperSafe,\n\n Use the code below to login to SupperSafe Photo Vault. \n\n %1$s \n\n Didn’t request an access code? Then you can ignore this email. \n\n Your Friends, \n The SupperSafe Team SupperSafe Photo Vault Access Code: %1$s device_id device_type manufacturer name_model version versionRelease code verify_account

/*Google Drive api*/ parents appDataFolder files(id,name,kind,mimeType,description) SupperSafe "mimeType = 'application/vnd.google-apps.folder'" "mimeType != 'application/vnd.google-apps.folder'" "mimeType = 'image/jpeg'" fullFileExtension description .jpg .png image/jpeg image/png db-supper-safe.db
